briefTitle: Virtual Continuity and Its Impact on Complex Hospitalized Patients' Care

outcomeMeasures.title: Medication Errors at Hospital Discharge
outcomeMeasures.description: Medication name, dose, and frequency of administration for patient pre-admission medications will be recorded. Medications received during the hospitalization and discharge medications will be obtained by medical record review following hospital discharge. Pre-admission medications will be compared to discharge medications and differences will be considered discharge medication variances. Two trained pharmacists will independently review medication variances to determine clinical indications or medication errors.

outcomeMeasures.title: Patient PCP Visits, Emergency Room Visits and Rehospitalizations Within 30 Days Post-discharge.
outcomeMeasures.description: Details regarding patient PCP follow-up office appointments, ER visits and rehospitalizations occuring within 30 days post-discharge will be collected from the EMR.
